languages.text: "Надеюсь, ты еще дышишь? Я намерен продлить твои страдания. Моли о пощаде так, как молили мои ребята, погибая от твоих проклятых ксеноигрушек!"

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, ты еще дышишь? Я намерен продлить твои страдания. Моли о пощаде так, как молили мои ребята, погибая от твоих проклятых ксено-игрушек!"

languages.text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, ты еще дышишь? Я намерен продлить твои страдания. Моли о пощаде так, как молили мои ребята, погибая от твоих проклятых ксеноигрушек!"

traits.locale_text: "You are still breathing, I hope? I intend for your suffering to be very prolonged. Beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying to your blasted xenos toys!"
"You are still breathing, I hope? I intend to prolong your suffering. Beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying to your blasted xenos toys!"
"You are still breathing, I hope? I intend for your suffering to be very prolonged. Beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying to your blasted xenos toys!"
"You are still breathing, I hope? I intend for your suffering to be very prolonged. Beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying to your blasted xenos toys!"
"You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"
"You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"

languages.text: 「まだ生きてるよな？こっちはお前の苦しみを引き出すつもりなんだ。俺の仲間がお前の悍ましいおもちゃの異種族に殺された時のように、命乞いさせてやる！」
languages.original_text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"

traits.locale_text: 「まだ生きてるよな？こっちはお前の苦しみを引き出すつもりなんだ。俺の仲間がお前の悍ましいおもちゃの異種族に殺された時のように、命乞いさせてやる！」

languages.text: «Espero que sigas respirando, porque tengo intención de prolongar tu sufrimiento. ¡Suplica clemencia como mis muchachos suplicaron cuando morían a manos de tus malditos juguetes xenos!».
languages.original_text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"

traits.locale_text: «Espero que sigas respirando. Tengo intención de prolongar tu sufrimiento. ¡Suplica clemencia como mis muchachos suplicaron cuando morían a manos de tus malditos juguetes xenos!».

languages.text: “你还没断气吧？但愿如此！我要尽可能地折磨你。向我求饶吧，哀求我！就像我的孩子们被你那些该死的异形玩具折磨致死时那样！”
languages.original_text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"

traits.locale_text: “你还没断气吧？但愿如此！我要好好地折磨折磨你。向我求饶吧，哀求我！就像我的孩子们被你那些该死的异形玩具折磨致死时那样！”

languages.text: « J'espère que tu respires encore. J'ai bien l'intention de te faire souffrir très longtemps. Tu finiras par me supplier de t'achever comme mes gars t'ont supplié alors qu'ils se faisaient tuer par tes foutus jouets xénos ! »
languages.original_text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que tu respires encore. J'ai bien l'intention de te faire souffrir très longtemps. Tu vas me supplier de t'achever comme mes gars t'ont supplié alors qu'ils se faisaient tuer par tes foutus jouets xénos ! »

languages.text: "Ihr atmet noch, hoffe ich? Ich habe vor, Euer Leid zu verlängern. Ihr werdet um Gnade flehen, wie meine Jungs flehten, als sie durch Eure verfluchten Xeno-Spielzeuge starben!"
languages.original_text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr atmet noch, hoffe ich? Ich habe vor, Euch sehr lange leiden zu lassen. Fleht um Gnade, wie meine Jungs gefleht haben, als sie durch Eure verfluchten Xeno-Spielzeuge starben!"

languages.text: "Henüz nalları dikmemişsindir umarım. Sana daha neler çektireceğim neler... Kahrolası zeno oyuncaklarından ölürken adamlarım merhamet dilediyse sen de dileyeceksin!"
languages.original_text: "You're still breathing, I hope? I plan to draw out your suffering. Make you beg for mercy the way my boys begged when they were dying from your blasted xenos toys!"
